Title: Sneaky Pebbles
Description:
Beetles are swarming our support creche! Some of them are now eating pieces of broken Infusers, and that's making them stronger. We keep trying to smush them, but they won't stay smushed.

Now it's harder to get rid of them, but we have a plan. We've discovered that hitting them with pieces of broken Infusers can weaken them again!

Do you mind helping us clear out these Infused Beetles?
